body_html:
@MarkDaoust I haven't any personal experience with it, but Red Hat has a tool called Zanata that can be used for both docs and software http://zanata.org/

I am very interested in how we can organize community contribution to documentation. We have a large opportunity with China, for instance.

body:
@MarkDaoust I haven't any personal experience with it, but Red Hat has a tool called Zanata that can be used for both docs and software http://zanata.org/

I am very interested in how we can organize community contribution to documentation. We have a large opportunity with China, for instance.
